title: Stablecoin: The Next Wave of Digital Finance
content:
Stablecoin is no longer a niche innovation within the cryptocurrency world. With annual transfer volumes reaching $27.6 trillion in 2024â€”a figure 7.7% higher than the combined volume of Visa and Mastercard, according to a Jan. 31 report by crypto exchange CEX.io., it is fast becoming a cornerstone of global finance. Its rise marks a pivotal moment in the evolution of money, as regulatory frameworks worldwide catch up to innovation, paving the way for broader adoption.
This article explores why Stablecoins are gaining traction and how regulatory momentum is shaping their future.
